Package no.hiof.larseknu.game

Class PlayerCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.hiof.larseknu.game.PlayerCharacter

  • public class PlayerCharacter
extends java.lang.Object
    PlayableCharacter is a class that represent a playable character in the game. Holds information about the name, health and current weapons.
    Author:
    Lars Emil, Uncle Bob

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int health  
      private boolean isNoob  
      private java.lang.String name  
      private java.lang.String nickName  
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> weapons  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PlayerCharacter​()
      Sets a default name for the PlayerCharacter, sets isNoob to true and generates a list of starting weapons.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerCharacter

        public PlayerCharacter​()
        Sets a default name for the PlayerCharacter, sets isNoob to true and generates a list of starting weapons.

    • Method Detail

      • sleep

        public void sleep​()
        Should be called when the PlayerCharacter is sleeping. Increases the health of the character within a random range between 0 and 100.

      • takeDamage

        public void takeDamage​(int damage)
        Decreases the PlayerCharacter health with the set damage, down to a minimum of 0
        Parameters:
        damage - amount of damage the PlayerCharacter takes

      • generateName

        private java.lang.String generateName​()
        Generates a name from a set list
        Returns:
        the generated name

        private void createStartingWeapons​()
        Creates the list of weapons the PlayerCharacter should start with when created the first time

        Throws:
